name: ItkySmartHome
0:
”Alexa turn on the light”
”Alexa turn on the Air conditioner”
”Alexa turn on the bedroom”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Voice control your home appliances with Itky Smart Home and Amazon Alexa. This skill works with Itky Four Node Switch, Single Node Smart Switch and AC/ Geyzer switch. Please use the Itky app (iOS or Android) to configure your Itky devices to your home WiFi network and give them distinct names.

The steps to enable Itky Smart Home skill are-

1. Click on Skills & Games section from the Amazon Alexa App.
2. Click on the search icon at the top
3. Now search for "Itky" and click on enable.
4. Use your Itky Smart Home mobile app login details to link the account.

Itky Smart Home devices that are compatible with this skill are:

1. Smart Switch : Control any switch up to 6 Amp . This is for a single appliance.
2. Four Channel Smart Switch : Control any four switches up to 6 Amp each. 
3. AC/ Geyzer Smart Switch : Control any one high power appliance up to 16 Amp
4. Smart Door Lock : Unlock your door from the Itky app. Requires a lock and a WiFi controller
